title: Does Macy’s Price Match? An In-Depth Guide to Their Price-Adjusting Policy

steps.title: Macy’s offers price adjustments for their items within 10 days of purchase.
steps.content: Macy’s offers price adjustments for their items within 10 days of purchase. While Macy’s doesn’t price match competitors anymore, they do match their own prices in store and online. You can request a price adjustment if you find a lower price for your exact item on Macy’s website and your original purchase wasn’t made with a promo code or discount offer. If your item qualifies, they will refund you the difference to your original form of payment. [1] X Research source what-are-macys-policies-for-online-merchandise-pricing-and-price-adjustments Macy’s only offers price adjustments for online listings on their site, not in-store listings. Items shipped and sold by third-party sellers do not qualify for price adjustments. Macy’s only accepts price requests submitted by customers, not applications or third-parties (i.e. Capital One Shopping). If you’re requesting a price adjustment for an online purchase, the 10-day price adjustment request period begins on the day you place your order—not the day you receive it.

steps.title: In-Store
steps.content: In-Store Search for a cheaper listing of your exact item on Macy’s website . Then, bring your purchase receipt and proof of the lower price listing to any Macy’s cashier. If your item is eligible for a price adjustment, the cashier will refund you the price difference to your original form of payment on the spot. [2] X Research source

steps.title: Online
steps.content: Online Once you find a better deal online, start a virtual chat with a Macy’s customer service representative or email them at customerservice@macys.com. Provide the Macy’s representative your order number, email address, first and last name, phone number, shipping address, items to adjust, and sale date. Then, tell them your price adjustment request to see if your item is eligible. [3] X Research source what-are-macys-policies-for-online-merchandise-pricing-and-price-adjustments Alternatively, you can call 1-800-BUY-MACY (1-800-289-6229) and request a price adjustment, but it might take longer than chat or email if you’re placed on hold. Macy’s virtual chat is available Monday through Sunday from 9AM to 12AM (EST), excluding holidays.

steps.title: Email furnitureandbedding@macys.com to request a price adjustment.
steps.content: Email furnitureandbedding@macys.com to request a price adjustment. For furniture and mattress purchases, Macy’s has a slightly different price adjustment policy than the rest of their merchandise. To qualify, you must email them your salescheck number, order number, email address, first and last name, phone number, shipping address, items to adjust, and sale date. And, their 10-day price adjustment request window varies by purchase: [4] X Research source White Glove, In-Home & Room of Choice: 10 days from the date of delivery Parcel from Warehouse: 10 days from the date your item is shipped from the warehouse Parcel from Vendor: 10 days from the date your item is shipped from the vendor

steps.title: The item listing must be identical to your original purchase.
steps.content: The item listing must be identical to your original purchase. Make sure that the brand, size, color, and model specifications of the lower-priced item matches the item you bought. Even if there’s a minor difference, it may disqualify your price adjustment request. [6] X Trustworthy Source Consumer Reports Nonprofit organization dedicated to consumer advocacy and product testing Go to source

steps.title: Items purchased with a discount do not qualify for price adjustments.
steps.content: Items purchased with a discount do not qualify for price adjustments. If you purchased an online or in-store item with a promo code or special offer, it doesn’t qualify for any price adjustment. This includes retail holidays like Black Friday, Cyber Monday, and Christmas Savings Events. [7] X Research source

steps.title: Items shipped and sold by third-party sellers don't qualify for price adjustments.
steps.content: Items shipped and sold by third-party sellers don't qualify for price adjustments. If your item is processed by Macy’s Digital Marketplace or their Direct from Vendor sellers, it isn’t eligible for a price adjustment. Before purchasing an item online, check if there’s any text underneath the name of the product: if it says “Sold and shipped by Hope & Henry (or any other brand),” it indicates it’s a third-party seller. [8] X Research source

steps.title: Apple products have a price adjustment request period of 14-30 days.
steps.content: Apple products have a price adjustment request period of 14-30 days. Unlike the 10-day price adjustment request window for most of their merchandise, Macy’s offers price adjustments within 14 days for iPhones and 30 days for all other Apple products. [9] X Research source
